-  init(leftTangent:rightTangent:topTangent:bottomTangent:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:) 

Initializer# init(leftTangent:rightTangent:topTangent:bottomTangent:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
init(
    leftTangent: Float,
    rightTangent: Float,
    topTangent: Float,
    bottomTangent: Float,
    nearZ: Float,
    farZ: Float,
    reverseZ: Bool
)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3DFloat/init(leftTangent:rightTangent:topTangent:bottomTangent:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)#parameters)

`leftTangent`The left tangent.

`rightTangent`The right tangent.

`topTangent`The top tangent.

`bottomTangent`Bottom left tangent.

`nearZ`The near @p z .

`farZ`The far @p z .

`reverseZ`A Boolean value that specifies whether the matrix should use reverse z.

## [Return Value](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3DFloat/init(leftTangent:rightTangent:topTangent:bottomTangent:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)#return-value)

A projective transform from tangents for each side of its frustum.

## [Discussion](/documentation/Spatial/ProjectiveTransform3DFloat/init(leftTangent:rightTangent:topTangent:bottomTangent:nearZ:farZ:reverseZ:)#discussion)

Returns a projective transform from tangents for each side of its frustum.
